plot: Family Album is about the complex emotions a body of personal photographs can arouse in us. Nishtha Jain documents and dramatises the imaginable worlds in and around assorted family albums....
title: Family Album
plot_es: Family Album is about the complex emotions a body of personal photographs can arouse in us. Nishtha Jain documents and dramatises the imaginable worlds in and around assorted family albums....
